criteria: Coverage: does the review encapsulate all relevant aspects of the topic, ensuring comprehensive discussion on both central and peripheral topics?
criteria_description: Coverage: Coverage assesses the extent to which the review encapsulates all relevant aspects of the topic, ensuring comprehensive discussion on both central and peripheral topics.
score1_description: The literature review section has very limited coverage, only touching on a small portion of the topic and lacking discussion on key areas.
score2_description: The literature review section covers some parts of the topic but has noticeable omissions, with significant areas either underrepresented or missing.
score3_description: The literature review section is generally comprehensive in coverage but still misses a few key points that are not fully discussed.
score4_description: The literature review section covers most key areas of the topic comprehensively, with only very minor topics left out.
score5_description: The literature review section comprehensively covers all key and peripheral topics, providing detailed discussions and extensive information.

criteria: Structure: Are the sections and subsections logically organized and coherent, ensuring that they are logically connected?
criteria_description: Structure: Structure evaluates the logical organization and coherence of sections and subsections, ensuring that they are logically connected.
score1_description: The literature review outline lacks logic, with no clear connections between sections, making it difficult to understand the overall framework.
score2_description: The literature review outline has weak logical flow with some content arranged in a disordered or unreasonable manner.
score3_description: The literature review outline has a generally reasonable logical structure, with most content arranged orderly, though some links and transitions could be improved such as repeated subsections.
score4_description: The literature review outline has good logical consistency, with content well arranged and natural transitions, only slightly rigid in a few parts.
score5_description: The literature review outline is tightly structured and logically clear, with all sections and content arranged most reasonably, and transitions between adjacent sections smooth without redundancy.

criteria: Relevance: Does the content of the review align with the research topic and maintain a clear focus?
criteria_description: Relevance: Relevance measures how well the content of the review aligns with the research topic and maintain a clear focus.
score1_description: The literature review section is outdated or unrelated to the field it purports to review, offering no alignment with the topic.
score2_description: The literature review section is somewhat on topic but with several digressions; the core subject is evident but not consistently adhered to.
score3_description: The literature review section is generally on topic, despite a few unrelated details.
score4_description: The literature review section is mostly on topic and focused; the narrative has a consistent relevance to the core subject with infrequent digressions.
score5_description: The literature review section is exceptionally focused and entirely on topic; the article is tightly centered on the subject, with every piece of information contributing to a comprehensive understanding of the topic.
